basics.name: Jonathan M Nguyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2018.

work.summary: Repair, replace, and maintain computers and other devices
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee computers of the department
Ensure all the students and staffs to have problems free with their computers
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone

work.summary: Cash handling, customer experience improvement,multi-tasking, and teamwork
highlights: Responsible for hundreds of transactions everyday
Listen to what customers need, and help them to get what they want
Work together as a team to handle everyday tasks and do our best to keep the store nice and clean
Being a trustworthy employee and a valuable team member are what I learned while working at Walgreens

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure

awards.title: First Place
awards.summary: I won the first place for the Sumobot Competetion of the Engineering Summer Program at Honolulu Community College in 2012 (See in my Project)

awards.title: Second Place
awards.summary: I finished 2nd place for the Mousebot Race for the same Engineering Summer Program at Honolulu Community College (See in my Project)
